Package org.mindswap.owl

Interface Summary
OWLAnnotationProperty  
OWLClass  
OWLDataProperty  
OWLDataType  
OWLDataValue Abstraction of data values a.k.a.
OWLEntity Generic interface for OWL classes, properties, and individuals.
OWLErrorHandler Basic interface for OWL error handlers.
OWLIndividual The interface for OWL individuals.
OWLIndividualList<E extends OWLIndividual> Represents a list of OWLIndividual objects.
OWLKnowledgeBase  
OWLKnowledgeBaseManager Knowledge base managers are used to control behavior of loading ontologies (via readers) into knowledge bases.
OWLModel A OWLModel is the data structure to manage a set of OWL axioms and assertions.
OWLObject  
OWLObjectConverter<T extends OWLObject> OWL object converter implement the functionality required to determine if a given object can be casted to (viewed as) another object type and also implement the cast operation itself.
OWLObjectConverterProvider Implementations provide OWLObjectConverter to be registered with a OWLObjectConverterRegistry.
OWLObjectProperty  
OWLOntology OWL ontologies may contain a set of OWL class, property, and individual axioms, and assertions about individuals.
OWLProperty  
OWLProvider Factory like encapsulation of methods that need to be implemented in order to provide major OWL data structures and reasoning engines.
OWLReader OWL reader realize parsing and loading serialized OWL ontologies into (in-memory) KBs.
OWLTransformator Transformators are used to transform arbitrary objects to and from OWL data values or OWL individuals.
OWLType Generic interface for OWLDataType and OWLClass.
OWLValue Generic interface for OWL data values or individuals.
OWLWriter OWL writer implement functionality to serialize OWL models by writing them to a Writer or OutputStream using some standardized format such as RDF/XML or Turtle.
 

Class Summary
EntityFactory Deprecated. Always try to create OWL entities from an existing knowledge base or an existing ontology; see also OWLFactory.createKB() and OWLKnowledgeBase.createOntology(URI).
OWLConfig This class is thread safe.
OWLFactory  
OWLObjectConverterRegistry Global singleton registry for all OWLObjectConverter.
 

Enum Summary
OWLSyntax Enumeration of syntax formats available for OWL.
